name: The Legend of The Duck Knite
storyline: The Duck Knite is a hero that just fights. He does not care about what monsters he fights just want to take them down. This platformer is old school with new school graphics.
summary: The Duck Knite is a hero that just fights. He does not care about what monsters he fights just want to take them down. This platformer is old school with new school graphics.
